scripts.build:
echo " 🏗️   Starting Build Process 
 🩺  First Testing Build... " && node tests/*.js && echo " ✔️   All the Test Have Passed!" && echo "Removing Previous Build Directory🗑️" && rm -ri dist && echo " 👷      Executing Build Process"  && parcel build ./src/index.html --experimental-scope-hoisting
scripts.test: node tests/*.js && echo "All the Test Have Passed!"✔️
